body.name: SSK 2TB External USB SSD,Super Fast 550MB/s 2-in-1 Dual Drive USB Type C+ USB A 3.2 Gen2 Solid State Thumb Drive Data Storage for iPhone 15/PS4/Android Phone/Tablet/Windows/Mac
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 24 mins
features: Dual Drive USB Type C + USB A: Perfectly equipped with an USB-C port and USB-A 3.2 port,SSK Dual USB SSD solid state drive allows you transfer data between smartphone/tablet and computer more conveniently. Instantly free up space or quickly move pictures or movies on your OTG enabled Android Type C phone, tablet, MacBook, Windows computer, car audio system, smart TV and more.

Ultra Fast Transfer Speed: SSK USB 3.2 Gen 2 Solid State SSD drive up to 550mb/s read speed and 500mb/s write speed, which is 10 times faster than traditional USB 3.0 flash drive and memory stick. Let you move high-resolution photos, videos and large-capacity files fast. Based on internal testing, performance may vary slightly due to factors such as host equipment, interfaces, and usage conditions.

Plug and Play: SSK dual drive supports plug and play, without any software installation. At the same time, USB SSD stick can expand the capacity of phones and computer. It is convenient for everyone to use the mobile phone to directly read the thumb drive for file sharing, data transmission, and video playback when working or studying.

Safe & Reliable: SSK USB SSD drive is made of high-grade zinc alloy material, it has excellent shock resistance and fast heat dissipation performance to better protect your data. The design of the double-head protective cover better protects the two interfaces.

Universal Compatibility: High speed USB stick external storage compatible with computer equipment, smart TV, car audio, smart phones, iPhone 15, iPad, Laptops, Macbook and more. Backward-compatible with USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 ports. Comes with default format EXFAT, it works with most systems such as Windows/Linux/Mac OS./Android(Incompatible with lightning port)
body.description: High-Grade Zinc Alloy Housing USB C and USB A High-Speed Transmission Ports Portable Dual Flash Drive It is perfectly equipped with an USB-C port and USB-A 3.2 interface, the dual flash drive allows you transfer data between smartphone/tablet and computer more conveniently. Perfect storage solution for anyone on the go or at work. Tips: The Computer and USB Flash Drive have Different Capacity Calculation Algorithms. The Computer 1G=1024M, USB Flash Drive 1G=1000M, so the USB Flash Drive's Capacity Displayed on the Computer is about 90% of the Actual Identification. Wear-resistant Appearance Double-Head Protective Cover Universal compatibility Available Capacity:128GB,256GB,512GB,1TB,2TB Flash drive for your choice

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Super Fast USB3.2 Gen 2 Type C + USB A Dual Flash Drive This Dual flash drive adopts the latest USB 3.2 Gen 2 standard, up to 550 MB/s read speed and 500 MB/s write speed, send 2GB 4K UHD video files from the storage stick to your PC in just 5 seconds , Let you work and play more efficiently. (Please Note: If connect to a USB 3.0 or USB 3.1 Gen1 interface, the transfer speed will be limited up to 450MB/s.)Work as fast as you need to with premium performance and huge capacities in a reliable USB flash drive. Ultra-fast performance lets you transfer a full 4K movie to the drive in less than 10 seconds, or 1000 photos in less than 20 seconds.

Stable Reading/Writing Speed During the transmission and the use of capacity, Ultra dual flash drive still maintain high-speed transmission.It will not drop off sharply halfway through the read process even when it reaches its full storage capacity. Let you move high-resolution photos, videos fast and large-capacity files. Note: The Writing Speed remains stable when the file size of each transfer is less than 1/4 of the remaining usuable capacity. For example, when the USB SSD drive has 600GB available capacity left, you can transfer data less than 150GB at a time, the speed will not drop.

SSK products are constructed to the highest standards and rigorously tested. You can be confident in the outstanding quality, performance and reliability of every SSK products. Note: Only when your connection port is USB3.2 Gen2 or higher, the reading speed can reach up to 550MB/s For new devices, you need to insert a little force into the computer at first. High-Grade Zinc Alloy Housing USB C and USB A High-Speed Transmission Ports Portable Dual Flash Drive It is perfectly equipped with an USB-C port and USB-A 3.2 interface, the dual flash drive allows you transfer data between smartphone/tablet and computer more conveniently. Perfect storage solution for anyone on the go or at work. Tips: The Computer and USB Flash Drive have Different Capacity Calculation Algorithms. The Computer 1G=1024M, USB Flash Drive 1G=1000M, so the USB Flash Drive's Capacity Displayed on the Computer is about 90% of the Actual Identification. Wear-resistant Appearance Double-Head Protective Cover Universal compatibility Available Capacity:128GB,256GB,512GB,1TB,2TB Flash drive for your choice

SSD Good DIE grade Chip, Safe & Reliable Using original SSD solid-state Good DIE grade memory chips, with high quality and strong stability. It features a zinc alloy material casing that protects the drive from unexpected knocks, fast heat dissipation and low power consumption. It also comes with a leather case for your portable carry. Note: The speed does not drop when write data at once within 1/4 of remaining capacity. Super Fast Speed Memory Stick Data Storage up to 550mb/s read speeds and 500mb/s write speed,which is 10 times faster than traditional USB 3.0 memory stick. Tips: If connect to a USB3.0 or USB3.1 Gen1 port, the transfer speed will be limited up to 450MB/s. Let you work and play more efficiently. Support Win to go USB flash drive supports win to go system, allowing the system to be carried with you, thereby improving work efficiency. Tips: The product itself doesn't have a system, and the WTG system needs to be installed by yourself. MacBooks with M1 and M2 chips do not support WTG. Plug and Play SSK Dual flash drive with the Type C and USB A 3.2 Gen2 port, photo memory stick for computer & android phones. You can easily transfer files and data between smartphones, tablets and computers, efficiently save file transfer time.

Whether the product is compatible with IOS？ Thank you for your question and our SD301 is compatible with Type C and USB A ports. If your IOS device is with a lightning port, It is not compatible with our SD301. If your IOS device is with type C port, our SD301 can compatible with it well directly. You can first connect the C port of your phone, find and open the "Files" App, and then click "Browse", "SSK SD301" will appear so that you can start to use it. Is it normal for the product to heat up during use? This memory stick is a portable solid state flash drive, the speed is faster a lot than ordinary flash drive, and it is made of metal material, which has better thermal conductivity, so that the heat will be much more than the ordinary flash drive. Your hands may feel a little hot, but this is normal. This situation will not affect your use, nor will it damage the data. Our products have gone through a series of sophisticated tests, which is safety enough in normal using. Why can't SD301 be recognized on a smartphone? How to solve it? First, please go to check the flash drive’s format, please make sure it is EXFAT, if it is not EXFAT, please format it first (Before formatting, please backup all your data);Second, please go to check whether the OTG function is enabled, most of OPPO's mobile phones need to manually open the OTG function. Only when the OTG function is enabled, the data transmission of external devices can be carried out. So you need to turn on the OTG function of your phone. The details can be found on Youtube. You can search for "How to Enable OTG Connection on OPPO Developer Options" on Youtube. Why does the write speed of SD301 drop when I write to large files at once? Writing large-capacity files at one time,the write speed will decline is a common problem of most solid-state drives. Even solid state drives produced by well-known companies also have this problem, which is a technical problem, not a problem of our product itself. If you want to maintain a high write speed, it is recommended that you do not write more than 1/4 of the remaining usable capacity at one time. For example, when the USB SSD drive has 600GB available capacity left, you can transfer data less than 150GB at a time, the speed will not drop. Whether the product is compatible with IOS？ Is it normal for the product to heat up during use? Why can't SD301 be recognized on a smartphone? How to solve it? Why does the write speed of SD301 drop when I write to large files at once?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This 2TB thum drive is legitimate
reviews.reviewText: This 2TB thumb drive is Legitimate. It is fast and holds a true 2TB. It gets hot while you are saving large amounts of data to it, but cools off quickly and it does not get hot while you are playing music or a movie from it. I highly recommend it. (Beware of sellers offering 2TB drives for $20 to $50 they are fake drives and are extremely slow and will not hold a legitimate 2TB of data. They will fail and become corrupt. I have had to send two of them back for a refund.) However, I heartily recommend this drive, it is legitimate and the price was right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: I bought this SSD to keep all my emulated games in it since I quickly ran out of storage on my phone. And it works perfectly. The SSD is fast and I'm able to plug it into my phone and it instantly recognizes it. I do have to say that because it is an SSD it will get hot to the touch. This is pretty normal since it doesn't have anything to cool it down like a heat sink. But if you're going to use it to store files you should be good. Everything is metal and it feels high quality and strong and a bit heavy. Which makes it feel premium. I really enjoy this SSD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really love this little monster. I got a 1TB for moving stuff around computers. I really like the quality of this little guy and the metal casing. I never had issues with heat as mentioned in other reviews and transferred an .iso of Win 11 and Office 2021 around. I didn't pay attention and it took a minute because the USB 3.2 has a cover in the base and it has a USB C port up top under the folding protector. It's super fast. I have not used a lot of quality USB drives, but this is definitely a quality drive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great storage for videos and music
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this so I could watch videos and listen to music while flying. I hate having to pay for wifi on the airlines which is spotty at best just so I can watch a movie I have bought already. It's like having to buy my videos and music twice. This 1TB stick holds almost 100 videos (movies) and 500 songs in my play list. I'm no longer at the mercy of the airlines and I can enjoy MY movies and MY music MY way.I'm now entering the area of "end of the line" on my SSK 1TB stick. I've had this USB SSD for less than a month and I'm noticing a lag in my response time and loading time for videos and music play lists. No worries, I'm going to upgrade to the 2 TB version to put nearly my entire video and music play lists on file. I didn't think my data would take up so much room so fast, but it's putting a strain on the 1TB stick pretty quickly. My advice....Get the 2TB stick in the first place. That way you'll never have to transfer all your videos and music play lists over (which is a pain the a**). Both sticks are of superior quality and will serve me well for another year or two. They don't get hot (like some people stated in their reviews) maybe they are just touch sensitive. Get the 2TB version and you can't go wrong. I trust my entire video library and music play lists to these sticks. Get the 2 or 3 year back-up warrantee just in case (for reference).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing thumb drive
reviews.reviewText: Imagine an SSD drive that fits in your hand and downloads files in record times. I downloaded over 500GB of information in well under 8-minutes. I purchased a 2TB and several 500 GB drives from this same company. I've got 3 of them on a keyring, which is super convenient. To think you can carry an entire backup of a computer in your hand is wonderful. They do run a bit warm when downloading large amounts of data. In addition, these are robustly manufactured from metal...not cheap plastic. this is a company that cares about its products, and subsequently, its customers. A rare company in the USA age-of-plastics world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The build quality is good and a nice surprise.
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised that the SSD felt like nice quality not just cheap plastic. I just got it and it was all setup for exFAT, I plugged it into my iphone (with adapter) named the drive and away I went backing up all my photos and vids. I will update later after I use it more. Alot of memory in a small package. FAST!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well-Constructed Portable Drive
reviews.reviewText: At the time of purchase, this was one of the least expensive, brand-name 1TB thumb drives to be found on Amazon. It is a solid construction which offers the benefit of USB-A and USB-C connectivity. Transfer speeds were fast (I didn't get an objective measure), faster than other thumb drives that I have purchased within the past 6 months. It formatted with ease and, so far, has functioned reliably.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente funciona rápido y buena calidad
reviews.reviewText: Funciona muy bien, irreal que en ese tamaño le quepan los 2TB y la capacidad es real, ya le metí 1.4 terabites y sin problema, es rápido, solo que depende que tu computadora tenga los puertos nuevos y más rápidos para que funcione al 100%, en mi caso transfirió bastante bien 300 gigas a una tasa de 150mb/s pero mi compu ya es vieja, después de los 300 gigas si mermó mucho la velocidad por que se calienta bastante, pero funciona muy bien. Es muy robusto, se siente pesado pero no es grande. Excelente precio lo compré en $2,600 pesos, y está excelente. Que traiga las dos salidas integradas usb a y usb c, está increíble súper versátil y actual.

reviews.reviewTitle: Compact high capacity USB 1 TB thumb drive
reviews.reviewText: Solid metal construction and seems to work well. Wanted to use with my older TV USB port, but had to reformat it to NTFS first - came with exFAT which was not recognized by my TV. Then it worked. Not sure why it heats up fairly quickly and becomes quite warm, (my other 500 GB thumb drive doesn't do that). Perhaps the metal case allows for heat dissipation?

reviews.reviewTitle: SSK SSD USB externo de 2 TB
reviews.reviewText: Excelente producto, resistente y muy rápido en la transferencia de datos

Honnêtement je ne savais pas qu’il existait une clé USB aussi rapide et avec de telle capacité.Les transferts se font rapidement ( vidéos, photos, musiques ou autres).Je suis très satisfait de mon achat.
